item.trans: n. 狂热；放任 vt. 遗弃；放弃 同义词:loose, mania, desert, yield, quit He abandoned all hope.他放弃一切希望。
adv. 突然地；唐突地 同义词:suddenly, shortly, sharp to abrupt one’s visit突然中断访问
vt. 吸收；吸引；承受；理解；使…全神贯注 同义词:attract, engage, see, read, seize Blotting paper absorbs ink.吸墨水纸吸墨水。
n. 摘要；抽象；抽象的概念 adj. 抽象的；深奥的 vt. 摘要；提取；使……抽象化 vi. 做摘要；写梗概 同义词:brief, summary, resume, deep, nonobjective, extract, brief to abstract juice from an orange从橘子中提取液汁
n. 滥用；虐待；辱骂；弊端；恶习，陋习 vt. 滥用；虐待；辱骂 同义词:punishment, vice, strain, maltreat to abuse a privilege滥用特权
n. 学院；研究院；学会；专科院校 同义词:college, school The actor won Academy Award for his role in the film .那位演员由于他在电影中扮演的角色而获学院奖。

vt. 使用；存取；接近 n. 进入；使用权；通路 同义词:make use of, fashion, employ, border, exercise, opening, admittance Bank customers can access their checking accounts instantly through the electronic system.银行户主可通过电子系统即刻查找自己的支票活期存款账户。(或：银行客户可通过电子系统立即取出活期存款。)

n. 成就；完成；技艺，技能 同义词:achievement, effort, completion, success, execution Get yourself hooked on positive , meaningful success by treasuring and valuing and celebrating every accomplishment .珍爱、重视并庆祝每一个成绩，让自己沉迷于这种良好的、有意义的成绩。

n. 符合；一致；协议；自愿 vt. 使一致；给予 vi. 符合；一致 同义词:agreement, unity, identity, keeping, consensus, afford, allow, deal, extend, deliver, cotton, identify, square, meet with, correspond with to accord disputes调解争端

n. [会计] 账户；解释；[会计] 账目，账单；理由 vi. 解释；导致；报账 vt. 认为；把…视为 同义词:interpretation, explanation, construction, sake, reason, result in, to interpret, count, find, guess, feel, rate He was accounted a merciful man.他被人看做是一位仁者。
n. 会计师；会计人员 The accountant summed up the figures .会计把那些数字合计起采。
vi. 累积；积聚 vt. 积攒 同义词:store up, scrape up to accumulate great wealth by hard work靠勤劳积攒大量财富
n. 控告，指控；谴责 同义词:charge, incrimination The accusation has been that it has sucked business from elsewhere because of the no- regulation option .有人指责，正是这种无监管的选择，使新加坡从其它地方抢走了业务。
vt. 控告，指控；谴责；归咎于 vi. 指责；控告 同义词:blame, law, law, come in for blame We accused him of immortal conduct toward her.我们指责他对她的不道德行为。
vt. 使熟悉；使认识 同义词:familiarize You must acquaint with your new duties.你必须熟悉你的新职责。
n. 熟人；相识；了解；知道 同义词:knowledge, awareness Should auld acquaintance be forgot and never brought to mind ?旧日朋友怎能相忘，怎能不深埋心中？
vt. 获得；取得；学到；捕获 同义词:earn, buy, score, find, make to acquire an education受教育
n. 获得物，获得 同义词:getting, procurement, winning For the museum had no acquisition policy .博物馆没有任何收购政策。
prep. 穿过；横穿 adv. 横过；在对面 同义词:through, opposite The dog swam across the river.狗游过了河。

vt. 扮演；装作，举动像 vi. 行动；扮演，充当；表现，举止；假装，演戏；起作用，见效 n. 行为，行动；法令，法案；（戏剧，歌剧的）一幕，段；装腔作势 同义词:play, take a part of, operate, bear oneself, conduct oneself, behavior, dealing, action, going, bill The actress acts the part of the heroine.那位女演员扮演女主角。
n. 行动；活动；功能；战斗；情节 同义词:movement, function, doing, campaign, working It can improve heart action .游泳能增进心脏活动。

adj. 固执的，坚强的；坚定不移的；坚硬无比的 n. 坚硬的东西；坚石 同义词:fixed, strong, persistent, tough, steel, solid rock But it is adamant that it would not do the deal if it did not believe that Geely would be a "responsible future owner ".但是福特公司坚持认为，如果吉利公司不能成为一个“未来称职的所有者”，他们将拒绝同吉利签订协议。
vi. 加；增加；加起来；做加法 vt. 增加，添加；补充说；计算…总和 n. 加法，加法运算 同义词:improve, gain, accelerate, enhance, boost, jack, mount, hot, addition She added sugar to her tea.她在茶里加了糖。
n. 添加；[数] 加法；增加物 同义词:add, accretion addition , fund managers can lack bargaining power .此外，基金管理者缺乏议价能力。

n. 调整，调节；调节器 同义词:restructuring, conditioning, modulation, setup, accommodation The problem , however , is that the scale of adjustment may be too big to achieve by cuts alone .然而，现在的问题是，调整的规模可能太大了，仅靠削减支出难以实现增长。
adv. 公认地；无可否认地；明白地 同义词:allowedly, acknowledgedly The options are admittedly limited .诚然，人们的选择有限。
vt. 采取；接受；收养；正式通过 vi. 采取；过继 同义词:assume, take in sth The committee ultimately adopted his suggestions.委员会最终采纳了他的建议。
vt. 崇拜；爱慕；喜爱；极喜欢 vi. 崇拜；爱慕 同义词:enjoy, worship, love, sweetheart to adore God with true devotion虔诚地崇拜上帝
vt. 装饰；使生色 同义词:paint, hang garlands of flowers adorning her hair她头上戴着的花环
adj. 成年的；成熟的 n. 成年人 同义词:developed, grown, mature, major, grown-up Or we could clone an adult person .或者，我们可以克隆一个成年人。

n. 发展；前进；增长；预付款 vt. 提出；预付；使……前进；将……提前 vi. 前进；进展；上涨 adj. 预先的；先行的 同义词:development, growth, making, progress, increase, introduce, present, prefer, file, put in, go ahead, move ahead, up-front, prevenient The general advanced his troops to the new position.将军挥师前进到新阵地。
n. 优势；利益；有利条件 vi. 获利 vt. 有利于；使处于优势 同义词:behalf, superiority, asset, benefit, edge, gain, make a profit, favor of, be conducive to It would advantage you to work hard.努力工作对你会有益。

n. 到来；出现；基督降临；基督降临节 同义词:arrival, occurrence, emergence, appearance, rise What happened in Japan qualified, as did the advent of mass production in America a century ago .在日本发生的正是这种变革，就像一个世纪前在美国出现的规模化生产一样。
n. 广告，宣传 同义词:publicity, bill, propaganda, dissemination, drumbeating I wish to insert advertisement in your newspaper .我希望在你们的报纸上登一则广告。
n. 广告客户；刊登广告的人 They advertised that a position was open.他们公布有一个职位空缺。
vt. 建议；劝告，忠告；通知；警告 vi. 建议；与…商量 同义词:alarm, message, agree to sb, make suggestions We strongly advise you to rid yourself of the bad habit of smoking.我们劝你坚决…改掉抽烟的坏习惯。

adj. 咨询的；顾问的；劝告的 n. 报告；公告 同义词:consulting, directory, report, announcement, declaration Moreover , as in Britain , the shareholder vote will only be advisory , and can be ignored by management .此外在英国，股东的投票表决将仅仅是作为参考，管理部门完全可以不予理会。
adj. 爱琴海的 n. 爱琴海（地中海的一部分） A mountain range of northern Greece near the Aegean coast .奥林匹斯山希腊北部靠近爱琴海海岸的一列山。
vt. 折磨；使痛苦；使苦恼 同义词:harry, worry, trouble, tear, devil She has been much afflicted by this sad news.她为此不幸的消息感到很难过。
adj. 苦恼的；痛苦难忍的 vt. 使极度痛苦；折磨（agonize的ing形式） vi. 感到极度痛苦（agonize的ing形式） 同义词:strait, heartsore to agonize over a decision为作决定而苦苦思索
adj. 令人愉快的；适合的；和蔼可亲的 同义词:pleasant, adaptive, lovely, calculated, grateful Life is in the business of making its environment agreeable for life .生命经营的事业就是改造环境使其有益于生命。
n. 农业；农艺，农学 同义词:farming, extractive industry Agriculture : rice , jute , tea , wheat ; beef .农业：水稻，黄麻，茶，小麦，牛肉。
adj. 空袭的 air- raid alarms were frequent and means for Members getting about scarce .空袭警报频繁，议员们的生活所需渐感缺乏。
n. 空气，大气；天空；样子；曲调 vt. 使通风，晾干；夸耀 vi. 通风 同义词:atmosphere, heaven, sky, high, look, sport, ventilate The sheets were aired on the line.床单晾在绳子上。
n. 警报，警告器；惊慌 vt. 警告；使惊恐 同义词:panic, tocsin, exercise, alert, warn to alarm the bank给银行装上报警装置
adj. 外国的；相异的，性质不同的；不相容的 n. 外国人，外侨；外星人 vt. 让渡，转让 同义词:foreign, external, foreigner, uitlander, transfer, negotiate Jim is an alien in this film .吉姆在这部电影里是个外星人。
adj. 相似的；相同的 adv. 以同样的方式；类似于 同义词:similar, same, uniform, like, parallel, similarly Birds are not all alike .鸟类不是都相似的。
adj. 通宵的；通宵营业的 同义词:nightlong, overnight An all-night party on New Year 's Eve .新年除夕举办的一次通宵晚会。
adj. 独自的；单独的；孤独的 adv. 独自地；单独地 同义词:independent, isolated, separate, sole, respectively, solely America cannot rescue the world economy alone .美国无法独自拯救世界经济。
adv. 一起；向前；来到 prep. 沿着；顺着 同义词:forth, together, to, ahead, front, down Along the river bank there is a hedge.沿河岸有一排树篱芭。
adv. 在旁边 prep. 在……旁边 同义词:aside The vessel anchored alongside the quay.船靠码头抛了锚。
vt. 改变，更改 vi. 改变；修改 同义词:influence, fashion, shift, vary, modify, modify, veer from Have you altered your mind?你改变主意了吗?

adj. 供选择的；选择性的；交替的 n. 二中择一；供替代的选择 同义词:selective, vicissitudinary An alternative to the all red bouquet is to buy some white roses and insert one red one in the center of the bunch.一种花束与所有都是红色花朵的花束不一样是，去购买一些白色的玫瑰穿插在红色的玫瑰花束中。
vt. 积聚，积累 同义词:pile up, store up She amassed her papers for her memoirs.她把文件汇集起来准备写回忆录。
vt. 使吃惊 同义词:take aback, take by surprise It amazed me (to learn) that she had been promoted.听说她提升了，真使我惊愕。
n. 野心，雄心；抱负，志向 vt. 追求；有…野心 同义词:careerism, aspiration, pursue / pursuit, go after She never ambitioned that.她对那从来没有什么野心。
adj. 野心勃勃的；有雄心的；热望的；炫耀的 同义词:thirsty, eager-beaver The agenda is ambitious , as it has to be .该议程是雄心勃勃的，这也是必须的。
vi. 总计，合计；相当于；共计；产生…结果 n. 数量；总额，总数 同义词:foot, gross total, sum, quantity of, gross, total The bill amounts to$102.此账单共计102美元。
adv. 充足地；广大地 同义词:enough, extensively That ensured plenty of interest , and those who watched were amply rewarded by her testimony .伊莉莎的声明无疑引起了众人关注，她的证词也充分填饱了在场听众好奇的胃口。
n. 消遣，娱乐；乐趣 同义词:entertainment, fun, occupation, pleasure, joy Is our destination the amusement park ?我们的目的是游乐场？
n. 锚；抛锚停泊；靠山；新闻节目主播 vt. 抛锚；使固定；主持节目 vi. 抛锚 adj. 末捧的；最后一棒的 同义词:kelleg, backer patron, fix, nail They anchored their ship off the shore.他们在滨外抛锚泊船。
adj. 年度的；每年的 n. 年刊，年鉴；一年生植物 同义词:yearly, etesian, year book, almanac When annual income is forced to exceed annual expenditure , the result may well be misery .当每年的收入被迫超过每年支出时，其结果很可能就是痛苦。

adj. 匿名的，无名的；无个性特征的 同义词:faceless, innominate At some point in Italy between 1268 and 1289 someone came up with the idea , but the actual inventor anonymous .在1268-1289之间的某一时刻，意大利的某个人有了发明眼镜的想法，但实际的发明者却不得而知。
n. 蚂蚁 同义词:emmet, pismire Can you name six things smaller than ant ?你能够说出六种比蚂蚁小的东西吗？
vt. 预期，期望；占先，抢先；提前使用 同义词:hope, presume upon We anticipated her winning first prize.我们期望她获得第一名。
adj. 古老的，年代久远的；过时的，古董的；古风的，古式的 n. 古董，古玩；古风，古希腊和古罗马艺术风格 vi. 觅购古玩 同义词:ancient, old, curiosity, virtu He spent his vacation antiquing in Beijing.他利用他的假期在北京觅购古董。
n. 焦虑；渴望；挂念；令人焦虑的事 同义词:solicitude, aspiration Studies show that French pupils report unusually high levels of stress and anxiety .研究表明学生压力和焦虑的报告中法国学生程度非常高。
adj. 焦虑的；担忧的；渴望的；急切的 同义词:eager, hungry, desired, sick, keen But it is also because the bank is more anxious about inflation .但也有原因是，欧洲中央银行相对更忧虑通胀问题。
n. 蚜虫（aphis的复数） Huahua 's family supports many aphides , which eat flowers and plants . They gather honey that aphides produce.原来，花花家族养了很多的蚜虫，蚜虫吃花园里的花草，而它们收集蚜虫排出的蜜露来吃。
adj. 道歉的；赔罪的 When they do bring it up - to employers , for example - they apologetic , self - defeating language .当她们必须与别人（比如雇主）谈及这个问题时，她们往往会变得过于谦卑，甚至说出对自己不利的言语。
vi. 道歉；辩解；赔不是 vt. 道歉；谢罪；辩白 同义词:square oneself, make an apology, square oneself, make an apology She apologized for accusing him falsely.她为错误地咒骂他而道歉。
vi. 呼吁，恳求；上诉；诉诸，求助；有吸引力，迎合爱好；（体育比赛中）诉诸裁判 n. 呼吁，请求；吸引力，感染力；上诉；诉诸裁判 vt. 将…上诉，对…上诉 同义词:attract, clamour for, asking, request, motion, charm to appeal a case to a higher tribunal把案件向高一级法院上诉
n. 外貌，外观；出现，露面 同义词:occurrence, aspect, emergence, external, outside That was also her final appearance on TV .那也是她在电视中最后一次演出。
vt. 任命；指定；约定 vi. 任命；委派 同义词:install, constitute, name, place, specify, nominate sb to, institute to to appoint a time for a meeting约定会议(或会见)时间：
vt. 欣赏；感激；领会；鉴别 vi. 增值；涨价 同义词:enjoy, see, grasp, value added, rise in price to appreciate good wine品尝好酒
n. 弧（度）；弧光（全称electric arc）；弧形物；天穹 adj. 圆弧的；反三角函数的 vt. 形成电弧；走弧线 Ranger 6 arced on a graceful,curving course towards the moon.(月球探测卫星)徘徊者6号沿着一条优美的曲线循弧线飞向月球。
n. 拱廊；（内设投角子电子游戏机等的）游乐场；有拱廊的街道 vt. 使有拱廊 同义词:recreation ground, amusement parks Mike : Those slogans are fine for fancy stores , but not at the arcade .迈克：这些口号对于奇异幻想商铺不错，但是不是在光盘商铺。
n. 考古学家 Hawass, a famed archaeologist and Egyptologist , said the man 's name is Imhesy .哈瓦斯是著名的考古学家和埃及古物学家，他说这名男子叫伊米艾斯。
adj. 建筑学的；建筑上的；符合建筑法的 The show also includes some of Wright 's drawings , architectural models and photographs .这次展览还展出了赖特的部分设计图、建筑设计模型和照片。
n. 拱门；拱道 He steered his cycle into Archway Road .他骑自行车来到阿奇维路。
adj. 努力的；费力的；险峻的 同义词:hard, rapid, bold, struggling Humans can quickly wreck the natural environment , but repairing it is a long , arduous process.人类可快速破坏自然环境，但修复环境却是漫长而艰钜的任务。
vi. 争论，辩论；提出理由 vt. 辩论，争论；证明；说服 同义词:debate, dispute about, debate, discuss, demonstrate, prove, satisfy He argued in favour of capital punishment.他提出理由赞成严惩。
n. 论证；论据；争吵；内容提要 同义词:brush, reasoning, dispute But during argument , my sense of humor is the first thing to go .可是，在争吵的过程中，我的幽默感是第一件消失的东西。
n. 贵族 同义词:prince, noble, nobility My father was a born aristocrat .我父亲是个天生的贵族。
adj. 算术的；算术上的 Theorem 6 gives us an alternate method for determining the arithmetical values of ??定理6给出另一个确定?盏氖?值的方法。
n. 陆军，军队 同义词:battalion, heer In other words, the army is still investigating complaints against itself .也就是说，军队仍然在调查这些针对自己的投诉。
vt. 引起；唤醒；鼓励 vi. 激发；醒来；发奋 同义词:encourage, attract, cause, produce, occasion, make someone tick, wake up The footsteps aroused the dog.脚步声唤醒了那条狗。
vt. 安排；排列；整理 vi. 安排；排列；协商 同义词:schedule, budget, place in, settle, form, place in, treat, form I arranged the books on the shelves.我把书架上的书籍整理好。
n. 文章；物品；条款；[语] 冠词 vt. 订约将…收为学徒或见习生；使…受协议条款的约束 vi. 签订协议；进行控告 同义词:item, provision, clause to article an apprentice立约收一名学徒
adj. 人造的；仿造的；虚伪的；非原产地的；武断的 同义词:synthetic, false, simulated, arbitrary You know , artificial boards are a source of the pollutant formaldehyde .你知道，人造板材是污染物甲醛的来源之一。
adj. 艺术的；风雅的；有美感的 同义词:art A copyright protects the physical expression of intellectual or artistic effort , not the idea .版权保护的是对智力或艺术成果的有形描述，而不是主意。
vt. 确定；查明；探知 同义词:confirm, identify, assure oneself to ascertain the facts查明事实真相
adj. 惭愧的，感到难为情的；耻于……的 同义词:compunctious Whoever blushes is already guilty ; true innocence ashamed of nothing .犯过错的人才会脸红；真正的无辜者无所愧疚。
n. 烟灰缸 同义词:tobacco jar Would you empty the ashtray , please?请你把烟灰缸清理一下好吗？
vt. 攻击；质问；着手解决 同义词:have at, come at to assail bitterly an enemy fort猛攻敌人要塞
vt. 集合，聚集；装配；收集 vi. 集合，聚集 同义词:aggregate, fall in, concentrate, collect, aggregate, mass, crowd The students assembled (或were assembled) in the school hall.学生们在学校礼堂集合。
vt. 评定；估价；对…征税 同义词:evaluate, rate, value, prize The lawyers assessed the property at $35,000。律师们估计这笔财产价值35 000美元。
adv. 刻苦地；勤勉地 同义词:diligently, sedulously Thank you . I will assiduously to the new work .谢谢。我将会全力以赴地投入到新的工作中去的。

adj. 组合的；各种各样的；混杂的 v. 把…分等级；把…归为一类（assort的过去分词） 同义词:various, combined Among the assorted education guarantees is that some pupils who fall behind will be able to get one-to- one catch-up tuition .为改善教育做出的五花八门的保证当中，也包含着对成绩落后的学生提供一对一的补习辅导。
vt. 承担；假定；采取；呈现 vi. 装腔作势；多管闲事 同义词:undertake, adopt, accept, shoulder, sustain, attitudinize, put on the dog The situation assumed a threatening character.形势显得很险恶。
n. 假定；设想；担任；采取 同义词:conception, perhaps, if The " logic " of this interpretation of the hypothetical experiment rests on a fundamental assumption .对该假想实验的这种解释的“逻辑”，建立在一个基本假设上。
n. 星号 vt. 注上星号；用星号标出 He added an asterisk to the first page .他在第一页上加了个星号。
vt. 使惊骇；使震惊 同义词:shock, appall I am astounded at (或by) …我对…感到震惊

vt. 使依附；贴上；系上；使依恋 vi. 附加；附属；伴随 同义词:stick on, piece on, to accompany, be with Attach the handle to the box.把把手安装于箱子上。
n. 攻击；抨击；疾病发作 vt. 攻击；抨击；动手干 vi. 攻击；腐蚀 同义词:attempt, push, have at, come at, eat, have at to attack the enemy攻打敌人
n. 达到；成就；学识 同义词:achievement, effort, success, wisdom, accomplishment In respect to the attainment of true spiritual consciousness there is yet another way .这就是关于真实体性上的知觉成就辨证而论的另一种方式。
vt. 出席；上（大学等）；照料；招待；陪伴 vi. 出席；致力于；照料；照顾 同义词:present oneself, invite, serve, board, mind, present oneself, nurse to attend a concert去听音乐会
n. 阁楼；顶楼；鼓室上的隐窝 同义词:garret, mezzanine floor We store trunks in the attic of the house .我们把箱子贮藏在房子的阁楼里。

n. 观众；听众；读者；接见 同义词:reader, interview The audience reacted readily to his speech .观众对他的讲演立即起了反应。

adv. 自动地；机械地；无意识地 adj. 不经思索的 同义词:voluntarily, mechanically The orthodox view was that investment adjusts to the full employment level automatically via the rate of interest .传统的观点认为，通过利息率可使投资自动地调整实现充分就业的水平。

n. 自动化；自动操作 同义词:robotization, automatic operation Semantic descriptions of device capabilities and functionality will let us achieve such automation with minimal human intervention.以语意描述设备的性能和功能，将会让我们获得最高的自动化结果。
adj. 有效的，可得的；可利用的；空闲的 同义词:valid, effective, virtual, telling, significant To maintain the integrity of the whole , these available choices are reciprocal ones .为要保持整体的完整性，这些可用的选择是相对的。
vt. 使敬畏；使畏怯 n. 敬畏 同义词:fear I was awed by her solemn words.她那番严肃的话使我敬畏。

n. 回水；死水；停滞不进的状态或地方 同义词:standing water, dead water He backwatered on his promise.他背弃了诺言。

vt. 烤，烘焙 vi. 烘面包；被烤干；受热 n. 烤；烘烤食品 同义词:to roast, torrefy, spitchcock Bake the bread in a hot oven for 45 minutes.在热烤炉里烘面包45分钟。

n. 交易；契约；特价商品 vi. 讨价还价；成交 vt. 讨价还价；拿…做交易 同义词:trade, special, truck, compact, bar tack, make a deal, bar tack We refuse to bargain over the price.我们拒绝在价格上讨价还价。
n. 基础；底部；垒 adj. 卑鄙的；低劣的 vt. 以…作基础 同义词:basis, elements, foundation, bed, bottom, poor, mean, dirty The U.S. squadron was based on the carrier.美国空军中队以这艘航空母舰为基地。
prep. 在，存在；是 同义词:at Caesar is no more.恺撒已不复存在了。
vi. 承受；结果实 vt. 忍受；具有；支撑 n. 熊 同义词:fruit, support, stomach, go, stand, abide, Bruin These columns bear the weight of the roof.这些柱子支承着屋顶的重量。
n. [机] 轴承；关系；方位；举止 v. 忍受（bear的ing形式） 同义词:relationship, connection, behavior, link, concern, swallowing The pain is almost past bearing .疼痛几乎就是过去的煎熬。

vt. 打；打败 vi. 打；打败；拍打；有节奏地舒张与收缩 n. 拍子；敲击；有规律的一连串敲打 adj. 筋疲力尽的；疲惫不堪的 同义词:strike, tank, best, strike, hit, tempo, knackered, outspent The police beat the door down in order to get into the building.警察为了进大楼强行砸开了大楼的大门。
vt. 拖脏；弄湿 vi. 弄湿；弄脏 同义词:get wet, imbrue, get wet, wet up She was all cold and bedraggled after falling into the river.她跌落河中后把全身弄得又湿又脏又冷。
n. 养蜂人 同义词:hiver, apiarist A beekeeper has been called in to take care of the problem .该镇请来一名养蜂人来解决这个问题。
vi. 急忙来回；突出 vt. 用槌打 n. 甲虫；大槌 同义词:stand out, excel at, maul Her eyes beetled across the map.她的眼光扫过那幅地图。
vi. 降临 vt. 降临；发生 同义词:generate, go on Bad luck may befall to anyone at any time.任何人任何时候都可能交噩运倒霉。

n. 存在；生命；本质；品格 adj. 存在的；现有的 Caesar is no more.恺撒已不复存在了。
vi. 属于，应归入；居住；适宜；应被放置 同义词:room, live, harbor They belong to the country club.他们是乡间俱乐部的成员。
n. [经] 财产，所有物；亲戚 同义词:estate, property, treasure, possession, worth Residents do not have many belongings .居民没有更多的财产。
vt. 使弯曲；使屈服；使致力；使朝向 vi. 弯曲，转弯；屈服；倾向；专心于 n. 弯曲 同义词:wind, curve, tend, affect, curve, give, winding, inflection The archer bent a bow.弓箭手射箭。
n. 利益，好处；救济金 vt. 有益于，对…有益 vi. 受益，得益 同义词:behalf, sake, profit, advantage, plus, profit, be good for That was a health programme to benefit everyone.那是一项对人人都有好处的健康计划。
n. 打赌，赌注；被打赌的事物 vt. 打赌；敢断定，确信 vi. 打赌 同义词:stake, make sure, be sure of, lay, stake I bet he'll be late.我断定他要迟到。

adj. 使人困惑的；令人产生混乱的 v. 使迷惑（bewilder的ing形式） 同义词:confusing, puzzling Appointments have been made and unmade bewildering speed, which has contributed to an unwelcome appearance of instability .委任的职位像走马灯一样换了又换，最终造成了些许的不稳定。
n. 困惑；迷乱；慌张 同义词:confusion, bemusement For a long time , I watched them scurrying around the base of the tree bewilderment .我观察良久，看到它们一直围着树干底部团团转，茫然不知所措。
prep. 超过；越过；那一边；在...较远的一边 adv. 在远处；在更远处 n. 远处 同义词:above, without, than, over, past, away, afar, yon Beyond those trees you'll find a summer house.在树林的那边你将找到一间避暑别墅。
vi. 结合；装订；有约束力；过紧 vt. 绑；约束；装订；包扎；凝固 n. 捆绑；困境；讨厌的事情；植物的藤蔓 同义词:bond, couple, become one, combine, restrict, rope, difficulty, corner, dilemma, fix to bind his hands behind him把他双手反绑起来
n. 出生；血统，出身；起源 同义词:origin, extraction, blood, stem, stock the day her mother birthed her她母亲生她的那一天

n. [计] 比特（二进位制信息单位）；少量；马嚼子；辅币；老一套 vt. 控制 adj. 很小的；微不足道的 adv. 有点儿；相当 v. 咬（bite的过去式和过去分词） 同义词:ounce, tad, possess, contain, regulate, bottle, manage, tiddly, bite-sized, rather, lot The lion bit his trainer.狮子咬伤其驯兽者。
vt. 咬；刺痛 n. 咬；一口；咬伤；刺痛 vi. 咬；刺痛 abbr. 机内测试设备（Built-In Test Equipment） 同义词:cut, gnaw at, smart, mouthful, smart, gnaw at The lion bit his trainer.狮子咬伤其驯兽者。
adv. 苦涩地，悲痛的；残酷地；怨恨地 同义词:relentlessly, cruelly But in a bitterly competitive world , how should a company decide how much to spend on technology ?但是在在一个竞争如此激烈的世界，一家公司如何要决定在技术上花多少钱？

adj. 空白的；空虚的；单调的 n. 空白；空虚；空白表格 vt. 使…无效；使…模糊；封锁 vi. 消失；成为空白 同义词:flat, vacant, gap, vacancy, fuzz up, bedim, disappear, vanish away He blanked an entry.他删除了一个项目(或词条)。
n. 嘟嘟声；号声；巨响 vi. 发嘟嘟声；发出响而刺耳的声音 vt. 嘟嘟地发出；高声发出 同义词:toot, trumpet call, tootle The trumpets blared as the procession got under way.当队伍开始前进时小号发出刺耳的响声。
n. 块；街区；大厦；障碍物 vt. 阻止；阻塞；限制 adj. 成批的，大块的；交通堵塞的 同义词:piece, mass, barrier, bottleneck, stem, dispute, prohibit, discourage, batched, wholescale to block a legislation阻挠一项立法(的通过)
n. 董事会；木板；甲板；膳食 vt. 上（飞机、车、船等）；用板盖上；给提供膳宿 vi. 寄宿 同义词:meal, directorate, attend, guest, stay over to board the door and windows up将门窗用木板封上
n. 钩竿；一端有钩的撑篙

n. 身体；主体；大量；团体；主要部分 vt. 赋以形体 同义词:person, lots of, wealth, ocean, sea, organization, community She bodied forth the immortal mind.她使不朽的精神更具体化了。
vt. 轰炸，投弹于 vi. 轰炸，投弹；失败 n. 炸弹 同义词:founder, fail in, crump The enemy planes bombed our city.敌机轰炸了我市。
adj. 兴旺的，繁荣的；大受欢迎的 v. 兴旺（boom的ing形式）；发出隆隆声 同义词:prosperous, flourishing, thriving This is particularly true in booming Asia .尤其是在经济高速发展的亚洲。
vt. 引导；踢；解雇；使穿靴 n. 靴子；踢；汽车行李箱 同义词:aim, kick, kick to boot the soldiers使士兵穿上靴子
vi. 钻孔 vt. 钻孔；使烦扰 n. 孔；令人讨厌的人 同义词:drill hole, counter sunk, drill hole, counter sunk, hole, aperture to bore a hole into the wall钻孔入墙
n. 厌倦；令人厌烦的事物 同义词:taedium, ennui " Boredom , " Norman explains , " is a weak method for getting out of a rut .诺曼解释：「无聊，就是避免落入老套的一种弱方法；
vt. 烦扰，打扰；使……不安；使……恼怒 vi. 操心，麻烦；烦恼 n. 麻烦；烦恼 同义词:eat, burden, worry, go to trouble, trouble, worry, headache Her baby sister bother her for candy.她的小妹妹缠着她要糖果。
n. 底部；末端；臀部；尽头 adj. 底部的 vt. 装底；测量深浅；查明真相 vi. 到达底部；建立基础 同义词:basis, terminal, base, extreme to bottom a chair给椅子装椅面
n. 卵石，大圆石；巨砾 同义词:ratchel, grait When a stone falls into a pond , the ripples persist for a while . The credit crunch was a whopping great boulder .一块石头掉落水池所引起的波澜，会持续好长一段时间。而信贷危机就是这样一块特别大的石头。

adj. 有义务的；受约束的；装有封面的 vt. 束缚；使跳跃 n. 范围；跳跃 vi. 限制；弹起 同义词:controlled, liable, chain, jump, dance, region, extent, scope, spectrum, territory, range, area, to limit, be confined to The colt bounded through the meadow.那匹马驹跳着跑过牧场。
n. 边界；范围；分界线 同义词:region, extent, spectrum, territory, area The boundary particle theory " looks like " a theory of particles in the absence of gravity .边界上的粒子理论「看起来」像是一个不含重力的粒子理论。
n. 拳师，拳击手 同义词:pugilist, scrapper boxer pounded his opponent .拳击手猛击他的对手。

vi. 刹车 n. 闸，刹车；阻碍 vt. 刹车 同义词:spoke, lock He should not brake the car abruptly on an icy road.他不应该在结冰路上把汽车猛然刹住。
adj. 惊人的 同义词:tremendous, incredible, spectacular, striking, stupend Yes . We 've been to Mt. Jade and found it absolutely breath -taking .有的，我们曾经去过玉山，发现那里真是令人心惊肉跳。

vi. 繁殖；饲养；产生 vt. 繁殖；饲养；养育，教育；引起 n. [生物] 品种；种类，类型 同义词:increase, result, attract, keep, school, cause, mother, category, variety, manner, nature, description The sow breeds piglets in the spring.母猪在春天产猪崽。

adj. 简短的，简洁的；短暂的，草率的 n. 摘要，简报；概要，诉书 vt. 简报，摘要；作…的提要 同义词:little, passing, transient, compact, abstract, resume, abstract, epitomize The secretary of defense briefed the president on the enemy's strength.国防部长向总统简略汇报敌人的兵力。
adv. 短暂地；简略地；暂时地 同义词:momently, tentatively The secretary of defense briefed the president on the enemy's strength.国防部长向总统简略汇报敌人的兵力。
adv. 灿烂地；辉煌地；光亮地 同义词:lustrously, dazzlingly First , if pieces of your father icon are brilliantly for you , leave them as they are.首先，如果有些父亲形象的“片段”对你很合适，那么保持原样子。
adj. 棕色的，褐色的；太阳晒黑的 vi. 变成褐色 n. 褐色，棕色 vt. 使变成褐色 同义词:umber, suntan He was browned by the sun.他被太阳晒黑了。
n. 金银；纯金；金银块 同义词:pure gold, solid gold Two that have done investors proud are the yen and bullion .让投资者引以为傲的两类资产是日元和黄金。
n. 肿块，隆起物；撞击 vi. 碰撞，撞击；颠簸而行 vt. 碰，撞；颠簸 adv. 突然地，猛烈地 同义词:tumor, knub, hit, impact on, crash, to run into, to hit, suddenly, heavily, strong, sharp, hard Her car bumped a truck.她的汽车撞了一辆卡车。
adj. 颠簸的；崎岖不平的 同义词:jouncy, jolty Fasten your seat belts. It's going to be a bumpy night .系好安全带啊，夜路会很难走的/夜路会很颠簸的。
n. 束；捆 vt. 捆 vi. 匆忙离开 同义词:tract, truss, rope, bolt out, blow through We bundled the old newspapers for the trash man.我们为垃圾清理工把旧报纸扎成一捆。
n. 夜贼，窃贼 同义词:cracksman When the burglar hear their car he hop it out of the window .那窃贼听到他们汽车的声音就从窗口逃走了。
adj. 烧焦的；烧伤的 v. 燃烧（burn的过去式、过去分词形式） 同义词:coking The new skin grafted on the burnt leg .新的皮肤移植到了那条被烧的腿上。
n. 公共汽车 同义词:motorcoach, autobus They bused the tourists to the airport.他们用公共汽车把旅游者运送到飞机场。
n. 拜伦（男子名） Now the rat of Panic was gnawing at Byron 's spirit .如今恐慌正象耗子一样在啃啮拜伦的心灵。
n. 内阁；橱柜；展览艺术品的小陈列室 adj. 内阁的；私下的，秘密的 同义词:ambry, council of ministers, private, secret, underground, chamber, inside He has chosen loyalty over competence in cabinet .他选择忠诚胜于能力的人进入内阁。
n. 电缆；海底电报 vt. 打电报 vi. 打海底电报 同义词:electrical conduit, electric line Their fishing boats were cabled together before the storm came.暴风雨降临前，他们的渔船都用缆绳系在一起。
n. 笼，兽笼；牢房，监狱 vt. 把…关进笼子；把…囚禁起来 同义词:prison, jail They caught the fox and caged it.他们捉住狐狸并把它关进笼子里。
vi. 计算；以为；作打算 vt. 计算；预测；认为；打算 同义词:figure, cast, expect, propose, forecast, cast, find We must first calculate the horse-power needed to propel the ship.我们必须首先计算出驱动这艘船需要多大马力。
n. 日历；[天] 历法；日程表 vt. 将…列入表中；将…排入日程表 同义词:daily schedule, ephemeris But what if they forget to look at their calendar ?但是如果他们忘了看日历怎么办？
n. 照相机；摄影机 Hello . This is my new camera .你好，这是我的新照相机。
n. 运河；[地理] 水道；[建] 管道；灌溉水渠 vt. 在…开凿运河 同义词:pipeline, klong They can canal the natural forces.他们能疏导大自然的力量。
vt. 取消；删去 vi. 取消；相互抵销 n. 取消，撤销 同义词:recall, call it off, call it off, declare off, withdrawal, revocation She cancelled her trip to Paris.她取消了巴黎之行。
n. 盖；帽子 vi. 脱帽致意 vt. 覆盖；胜过；给…戴帽；加盖于 同义词:hat, operculum, uncap, invest, overcome, house, sheet, roof Don't forget to cap the tank after filling it up with petrol.灌满汽油后别忘了把油箱盖上。
n. 能力；容量；资格，地位；生产力 同义词:ability, competence, membership, status, productivity Subordination and silence best became their years and capacity .服从与沉默，最适合他们的年令与能力。
vt. 倾覆（特指船）；翻覆；弄翻 vi. 翻；倾覆；翻覆 同义词:turn turtle, keel over, tip, turn turtle Be careful not to capsize the boat.小心不要把船弄翻。
n. 胶囊；[植] 蒴果；太空舱；小容器 adj. 压缩的；概要的 vt. 压缩；简述 同义词:micella, compressive, constringent, to compress, telescope He capsuled the editorial.他把社论进行了压缩。
vt. 俘获；夺得 n. 捕获；战利品，俘虏 同义词:snatch, taking, prize, acquiring They captured more than ten thousand prisoners and large quantities of arms in that campaign.他们在那次战役中俘获了一万多战俘和大量武器。
n. [纸] 硬纸板；纸板箱；卡纸板 adj. 不真实的；硬纸板制的 同义词:hardboard, strawboard, impossible, unreal In the experiment , air pushes up on the cardboard .在这个实验里，空气给纸板向上的压力。
n. 关怀；照料；谨慎；忧虑 vi. 照顾；关心；喜爱；顾虑 vt. 在意；希望或喜欢 同义词:disturbance, worries, tend, attend, think of He cared only about his own family.他只关心自己的家庭。
n. 货物，船货 同义词:commodity, freight, merchandise This boat was cargoed with bananas and oranges.这只船装载着香蕉和橘子。
adj. 加勒比人的；加勒比海的；加勒比语的 n. 加勒比海 同义词:Caribbean Sea The story is about an old ship . It sails around the Caribbean islands .故事是关于一条旧船的，它环绕着加勒比海诸岛航行。
n. 木匠，木工 vi. 当木匠，做木匠工作 vt. 制作 同义词:squareman, woodworker, to make He carpentered in his youth.他年轻时当过木匠。
vt. 雕刻；切开；开创 vi. 切开；做雕刻工作 同义词:grave, engrave, slice from, cut open She carved a flower out of a radish.她把萝卜刻成一朵花。
n. 情况；实例；箱 vt. 包围；把…装于容器中 同义词:situation, circumstance, instance, thing, condition, invest, circumvent All the books have been cased for shipping.所有书籍已经装箱待运。
vt. 投，抛；计算；浇铸；投射（光、影、视线等） n. 投掷，抛；铸件，[古生] 铸型；演员阵容；脱落物 vi. 投，抛垂钓鱼钩；计算，把几个数字加起来 同义词:throw, pitch, mould, figure, putting, throw, figure, shy The boy cast a stone into the water.男孩把一块石头扔进水中。
n. 意外事故；伤亡人员；急诊室 同义词:contretemps, fortuity Free the nose and mouth of a casualty from dust and grit to ease breathing .替伤员清理一下鼻子和嘴里的尘土、沙砾，使其呼吸顺畅些。
n. 大灾难；大祸；惨败 同义词:fiasco, smashup Third , once the risks of financial catastrophe have passed , rapid easing can be mirrored by equally rapid tightening .第三，一旦金融危机的风险过去，快速的放松可以通过同样快速的收紧反映出来。
vt. 投合，迎合；满足需要；提供饮食及服务 同义词:humor, meet the demand He has a small hotel and also caters for weddings and funerals.他开了一家小旅馆，并承办红白喜事的酒席。
n. 牛；牲畜（骂人的话）；家畜；无价值的人 同义词:ox, moo-cow The cowboys herded the cattle and drove them to market .牧童将牛集在一起将它们赶到市场上去。
n. 原因；事业；目标 vt. 引起；使遭受 同义词:career, consideration, enterprise, matter, target, attract, produce, occasion, operate, induce The resignation of the prime minister will cause much confusion.首相的辞职将引起很大混乱。
n. （史前石器时代的）穴居人；野人 同义词:yowie, troglodyte The only way boxing can be discussed is in the context of a caveman ' s sport .拳击只能在原始人的运动这个意义上加以讨论。
n. 洞穴；凹处 vt. 挖空；置…于洞穴中 同义词:recession, cavity, hole, hollow out In the eerie silence of the cavern .洞里有一种可怕的寂静。

vi. 停止；终了 vt. 停止；结束 n. 停止 同义词:desist from, come to a stop, conclude, cheese, quit, stop, stay, stand, cessation, set-back The present system of reaping without sowing should cease immediately.目前这种不劳而获的制度应当立即废止。
n. 天花板；上限 同义词:overhead, high limit The sick old man does nothing but stare at the ceiling all day long .那个生病的老先生整天除了瞪着天花板看以外什么都没做。
n. 庆典，庆祝会；庆祝；颂扬 同义词:festival, commemoration The global host of the 2010 World Environment Day celebration is Rwanda .2010年世界环境日庆祝活动的全球主办国是卢旺达。
n. 细胞；电池；蜂房的巢室；单人小室 vi. 住在牢房或小室中 同义词:electric battery, electric element He celled with two other prisoners.他与另外两犯人一同关在一间牢房中。
n. 链；束缚；枷锁 vt. 束缚；囚禁；用铁练锁住 同义词:restriction, cord, bound, enslave He chained his bike to the fence.他用链条把自行车拴在栅栏上。
n. 香槟酒；香槟酒色 同义词:bubbly The real escapist can watch a free film show and sip champagne on some services .在某些航线上，真正想逃避现实的人，可以看看免费电影，喝喝香槟。

n. 机会，际遇；运气，侥幸；可能性 vt. 偶然发生；冒……的险 vi. 碰巧；偶然被发现 同义词:opportunity, possibility, probability, feasibility, opening, happen to, happen to do I chanced on this old photograph in his drawer.我在他的抽屉里偶然发现了这张旧照片。
n. 混沌，混乱 同义词:disorder, confusion, involvement, mix, turmoil " There is order in chaos , " Farmer says .“在混沌中存在着秩序”，法默说。

adj. 典型的；特有的；表示特性的 n. 特征；特性；特色 同义词:typical, representative, proper, very, own, quality, identity, tang, specific, distinction One of the characteristic features of this technique is its replicability .这种技术的独特的特征之一就是它的可重复性。
n. 查理（男子名） He once said Charlie Chaplin was his greatest inspiration .他曾一度说过卓别林是他最大的灵感。
n. 峡谷；裂口；分歧；深坑 同义词:canyon, pit, variance This new writer was totally unware chasm in the story .这个写作新手完全没意识到故事中的脱节处。
vi. 聊天；闲谈 vt. 与…搭讪；与…攀谈 n. 聊天；闲谈 同义词:visit with, chew the fat, chinwag, chit-chat They sat in a corner and chatted of old times.他们坐在一个角落里畅谈过去的时光。
adv. 高高兴兴地 And they cheerfully insist that the town can survive the wider damage , as long as prices stabilise or rise .并且，他们愉快地坚称，只要房价企稳或上涨，这个小镇就能避开更大范围的破坏。
vt. 珍爱；怀抱 同义词:treasure, imbosom They cherish their native land.他们热爱自己的故乡。
n. 胸，胸部；衣柜；箱子；金库 同义词:bureau, treasury, breast The knife penetrated his chest .刀子穿过他的胸腔。
n. 芝加哥（美国中西部城市） He joined the Chicago Bulls in 1984 .1984年，他加入了芝加哥公牛队。

n. 首领；酋长；主要部分 adj. 首席的；主要的；主任的 adv. 主要地；首要地 同义词:leader, captain, boss, primary, major, central, leading, great, mainly, basically, largely, mostly, primarily And many Republicans criticize the Fed chief -- himself a Republican -- for what they see as too much spending .很多共和党人批评联邦领袖自己也是个共和党人--他们知道的大量的花费。
n. 瓷器 adj. 瓷制的 同义词:porcelain ware, stoneware, porcelain China hit back over the weekend .中国上周末进行了反击。
vt. 削，凿；削成碎片 vi. 剥落；碎裂 n. [电子] 芯片；筹码；碎片 同义词:pele, whittle, shell, flake off, debris, patch She chipped one of my best glasses.她碰碎了我最好的玻璃杯。
vi. 发出轧轧声；发出嘎嚓声；发出轧轧声前进 n. （美）轧轧声 The old ship chugged along.这条旧船嘎嘎地往前行驶。
n. 大块；矮胖的人或物 同义词:bulk, blocking And the government gets a large chunk of revenue —not to be sniffed at in these difficult times .而政府得到了大把的财政收入—在现在的困难时期这不该被嗤之以鼻。
n. 环境，情况；事件；境遇 同义词:context, situation, setting, event, occurrence, thing, scene In any circumstance where light is being absorbed , there is a pressure.在任何情况下，凡在光被吸收的地方，就有光压。
n. 公民；市民；老百姓 同义词:people, municipality It is one of legality construction contents to make citizen know and obey law .让公民懂得法律和遵守法律是法制建设的一项重要内容。
n. 城邦 同义词:polis The tour ends where the world 's smallest city-state begins .旅行在世界最小的城邦开始之处结束。
adj. 公民的；民间的；文职的；有礼貌的；根据民法的 同义词:folk, polite Yes . and every citizen enjoys the capacity for civil rights from birth to death .是的。每个公民从出生起到死亡止都享有民事权利能力。
n. 文明；文化 同义词:culture, kultur This simple experiment was not undoing the clock ; it was undoing civilization .这个简陋的实验并非在逆转时钟，而是在逆转文明。
adj. 文明的；有礼貌的 v. 教化；使…文明；启发（civilize的过去分词） 同义词:polite, courteous, cultivated Schools will help to civilize the wild tribes there.学校教育将有助于使那里的野蛮部落逐步开化。
vi. 提出要求 vt. 要求；声称；需要；认领 n. 要求；声称；索赔；断言；值得 同义词:exact, say, lack, desire, call for, requirement, do, assurance, need, desire Every citizen may claim the protection of the law.每个公民都可以要求受到法律的保护。
vt. 夹紧，固定住 n. 夹钳，螺丝钳 同义词:keep in place, grip They clamped the two pieces of wood together securely.他们把这两块木材牢牢地夹在一起。
adj. 古典的；经典的；传统的；第一流的 n. 古典音乐 同义词:traditional, conventional, royal, classic music Yes , I like classical music .是的，我喜欢古典音乐。
vt. 分类；分等 同义词:categorize, sort through He says the administration decision to re- classify those documents is symptomatic of a larger , growing problem .他说将档案重新分类处理的行政决定是问题更严重，不断扩大的一种前兆。
n. [土壤] 粘土；泥土；肉体；似黏土的东西 vt. 用黏土处理 同义词:earth, flesh, dirt It is also important to dry the clay containers slowly .缓慢的干燥粘土容器也是十分重要的。

adj. 分裂的；劈开的 n. 裂缝；龟裂 v. 劈开；分开（cleave的过去式和过去分词） 同义词:divided, split, checking, crack, split, separated, clave A cleft graft , for example , requires a scion with several buds on it .比如，其中一种是裂接，它要求接穗上有几个芽。
adj. 书记的；牧师的；办事员的 n. 牧师 同义词:secretarial, ministerial, minister, priest, preacher Newspapers demanded to know if the pope would meet victims of clerical sex abuse .报纸想知道教皇是否会会见教士性虐待案的受害者。
n. 聪明；机灵 同义词:brightness, wiseness Everybody admired the boy 's cleverness .人人称赞这个男孩聪明。
vt. 点击；使发咔哒声 vi. 作咔哒声 n. 单击；滴答声 同义词:ticktack, tictac The door clicked shut.门咔哒一声关上了。
vi. 坚持，墨守；紧贴；附着 同义词:stay, stand on He clung to the rope with both hands.他双手紧紧攥住绳子。
v. 阻塞；障碍 n. 障碍；木底鞋 同义词:choke with, plug up, obstacle, let, bar, dam, stop The expressway was clogged with automobiles.这条高速公路被汽车堵塞了。

adj. 紧密的；亲密的；亲近的 vt. 关；结束；使靠近 vi. 关；结束；关闭 adv. 紧密地 n. 结束 同义词:familiar, near, compact, conclude, pull the plug, pull the plug, draw to an end, cheek by jowl, compactly, completion, termination, finish, ended up He closed his eyes.他闭上眼睛。
adv. 紧密地；接近地；严密地；亲近地 同义词:hard, cheek by jowl Pandora closely behind.潘多拉紧跟其后。
n. 亲密；接近；密闭；严密 同义词:approach, neighborhood These are basic industries in which closeness to raw materials and markets for their bulky products is paramount .对于这些基础产业来说，保持自身庞大的产品与原材料和市场的紧密联系是至关重要的。
n. 布，织物；餐巾 同义词:web, woven fabric They pretended to take the cloth off the loom .他们装做把布料从织机上取下来。
n. 云；阴云；云状物；一大群；黑斑 vt. 使混乱；以云遮敝；使忧郁；玷污 vi. 阴沉；乌云密布 同义词:horde, melasma, confuse, make hay of Fog clouded the road ahead.大雾笼罩着前面的路。
n. 线索；（故事等的）情节 vt. 为…提供线索；为…提供情况 同义词:action, plot, scenario Nobody clued us to this mystery.没有人向我们提供解开这个奥秘的线索。
n. 丛；笨重的脚步声；土块 vi. 形成一丛；以沉重的步子行走 vt. 使成一丛；使凝结成块 同义词:cluster, plexus, clot He was clumping about the kitchen in heavy boots.他穿着笨重的靴子在厨房走来走去。
n. 群；簇；丛；串 vi. 群聚；丛生 vt. 使聚集；聚集在某人的周围 同义词:gang, bunch, qun, bush, converge The students clustered their tents together.学生们把帐篷集中搭在一起。
n. 离合器；控制；手；紧急关头 vi. 攫；企图抓住 vt. 抓住；紧握 adj. 没有手提带或背带的；紧要关头的 同义词:control, hand, grasp, guiding, hold, grasp, noble, collar He clutched the rope we threw to him.他紧紧抓住我们抛给他的绳子。
n. 杂乱，混乱 vt. 使凌乱；胡乱地填满 同义词:chaos, disorder, confusion, involvement, mix Newspapers and magazines cluttered the bedroom.卧室里到处都是报纸和杂志。
n. 公鸡；龙头；雄鸟；头目 vt. 使竖起；使耸立；使朝上 vi. 翘起；竖起；大摇大摆 同义词:rooster, coq, peak, stick up, tilt The man cocked his hat in the latest fashion.这个男人按照最近时兴的方式歪戴着帽子。
n. 代码，密码；编码；法典 vt. 编码；制成法典 vi. 指定遗传密码 同义词:password, cryptogram, encode to code a telegram将电报译成密码
n. 衣领；颈圈 vt. 抓住；给…上领子；给…套上颈圈 同义词:neck, grasp, noble She collared my black wool coat with otter pelts.她把我的黑呢上衣镶上了水獭领。
n. 同事，同僚 同义词:brother, fellow, associate Colleague : 19 candles ? What did you do, burn them at both ends ?同事：19支？有没有搞错，难道每支蜡烛两头烧吗？
n. 收藏家；[电子] 集电极；收税员；征收者 同义词:publican, taxman Donald , I hear you are a collector of stamps .唐纳德，我听说你是一位集邮爱好者。
vi. 碰撞；抵触，冲突 vt. 使碰撞；使相撞 同义词:hit, impact on, crash His bicycle collided with a lorry.他的自行车撞在一辆卡车上。
n. （意见，看法）的抵触，冲突 同义词:interference, conflict, war, crash, impact The other process of droplet growth is by collision and coalescence .云滴增长的另一个过程是各云滴间的碰撞和并合。
n. 殖民地；移民队 同义词:settlements Experts gave a name to this mysterious situation , colony collapse disorder .专家给这种神秘的状况取名“蜂群衰竭失调症候”。

adj. 巨大的；异常的，非常的 同义词:huge, tremendous, enormous, massive, macro, intense Thanks to colossal improvements in sanitation and medicine , that figure is now 75 for men and 80 for women .由于人类在卫生学和医药学的巨大进步，现在男性的寿命是75岁，女性80岁。
adj. 鲜艳的；生动的；富色彩的；富有趣味的 同义词:vivid, telling, live Under the sunlight these shells in my hands became colourful , I was so happy beyond description.阳光下，那贝壳五光十色，绚丽多彩，拿在手里，别提多么高兴了。
n. 纵队，列；专栏；圆柱，柱形物 同义词:pillar, tier This column leans towards the instrumental approach .本专栏倾向于工具主义方法。
n. 喜剧演员；滑稽人物 同义词:funny, banana That comedian always cracks me up.那个喜剧演员总是让我发笑。
n. 安慰；舒适；安慰者 vt. 安慰；使（痛苦等）缓和 同义词:relief, ease, consolation, quiet, soothe Her mother's word comforted the sobbing girl.她母亲的话使这个哭哭啼啼的女孩得到慰藉。
adj. 舒适的，舒服的 n. 盖被 同义词:pleasant, easy, cozy Very comfortable and quiet .很舒服，也很安静。
adj. 安慰的；令人欣慰的 v. 安慰（comfort的ing形式） 同义词:conciliative, soothing Her mother's word comforted the sobbing girl.她母亲的话使这个哭哭啼啼的女孩得到慰藉。
adj. 喜剧的；滑稽的；有趣的 n. 连环漫画；喜剧演员；滑稽人物 同义词:colorful, funny, funny, stripcartoon A comic scene follows by way of relief .接着来一个喜剧场面以资调剂。

n. 评论；意见；批评 vi. 发表评论；发表意见 vt. 为…作评语 同义词:opinion, criticism, mind, judgement, thinking, declare oneself, air one's opinion Would you care to comment on why you voted against the new housing project?对您投票反对新住宅规划的原因您愿意解释一下吗?
n. 商品化，商业化 同义词:merchandizing It isn't wise to commercialize sport.把体育运动商业化并不明智。
adj. 共同的；普通的；一般的；通常的 n. 普通；平民；公有地 同义词:mutual, corporate, usual, ordinary, collective, ordinary, populace Even a common indoor plant can improve the feeling of a room .即便一种普普通通的室内植物也能提高室内感觉。
vi. 通讯，传达；相通；感染 vt. 传达；感染；显露 同义词:contract, intercommunicate, affect, catch, contract, convey Shool children often communicate colds to each other.学校的孩子们常常互相传染感冒。
n. 社区；[生态] 群落；共同体；团体 同义词:village, organization, body, group What makes it a community is ultimately in- person meetings .正是亲身的会面最终形成了一个社区。
n. [建] 隔间；区划；卧车上的小客房 vt. 分隔；划分 同义词:to divide, measure off Six people were travelling in a compartment on a train .有六个人搭乘火车旅行，坐在同一车厢内。
vi. 补偿，赔偿；抵消 vt. 补偿，赔偿；付报酬 同义词:make good, to make up for, make good, to make up for The factory will compensate their workers if they are hurt at work.工人在工作中受伤，工厂得给予受伤补助。
vt. 编译；编制；编辑；[图情] 汇编 同义词:to edit, copy-edit It often takes five or six years of hard work to compile a good dictionary.编一部好的词典常常需要苦干五六年。
n. 抱怨；诉苦；疾病；委屈 同义词:sickness, complain of The most common complaint centres on foreign policy .最常见的抱怨集中在其外交政策上。

adj. 复杂的；合成的 n. 复合体；综合设施 同义词:sophisticated, involved, synthetic, detailed, intricate Predictions about a mechanism as complex as the climate cannot be made with any certainty .对某种机制的预测就像不能作出任何肯定的气候预测一样复杂。
adj. 难懂的，复杂的 同义词:involved, detailed, sophisticated, elusive You mustn’t complicate the problem by raising new issues.你千万不要提出新的争端使问题更加复杂化。
n. 作文，作曲；[材] 构成；合成物 同义词:synthetic, songwriting He crossed off the needless words in his composition .他从作文中把不必要的字都删掉了。
n. 镇静；沉着 同义词:sedation, calmness He sensed she was making an effort to regain composure .他感觉到她是在极力使自己镇静下来。
adj. 综合的；广泛的；有理解力的 n. 综合学校；专业综合测验 同义词:extensive, integrated, synthetic, widespread, general We have a rather comprehensive subway system here .我们这儿有相当广泛的地铁系统。
n. 计算机；电脑；电子计算机 同义词:calculating machine, computing machine My computer sends it all.我的计算机发送它。
vt. 隐藏；隐瞒 同义词:lock, pocket, to hide He concealed the key inside his tie.他把钥匙藏在领带里面。
n. 怀孕；概念；设想；开始 同义词:idea, threshold, pregnancy, beginning, opening The heart is complex organ that starts beating at few weeks after conception .心脏是一个复杂的器官，它在生命孕育以后的一个星期开始跳动。
vt. 推断；决定，作结论；结束 vi. 推断；断定；决定 同义词:understand, condition, deduce from, draw the conclusion They concluded the meeting at 6 o'clock in the afternoon.他们于下午六点结束了会议。

n. 结论；结局；推论 同义词:outcome, ending, consequence, verdict In conclusion , Indians can make wonderful , inexpensive employees provided you put them to the job they will do best in.综上所述，印度人能成为极好的廉价雇员，如果你安排他们工作，他们将做得最好。
n. 混合；调合；调合物 同义词:mixture, mix Pouring ivory -white milk concoction , Mother smiles to herself.再浇上象牙白的牛奶以后，母亲自顾地笑了。
adj. 混凝土的；实在的，具体的；有形的 vi. 凝结 vt. 使凝固；用混凝土修筑 n. 具体物；凝结物 同义词:honest, effective, real, to freeze, clot, coagulation The workmen are still busy concreting the road.工人们仍忙着用混凝土铺路。
vt. 谴责；判刑，定罪；声讨 同义词:denounce, deplore Most people condemn war.大多数人都谴责战争。
vi. 导电；带领 vt. 管理；引导；表现 n. 进行；行为；实施 同义词:lead through, manage, run, direct, represent, aim, going on, behavior, dealing, enforcement, administration He conducted himself in a gracious manner.他为人和蔼可亲。
adv. 自信地；安心地 同义词:assertorically, securely Dr Davy confidently bats away some obvious doubts about the results .戴维博士极有信心的驳斥了对实验结果的明显怀疑。
vt. 面对；遭遇；比较 同义词:front, compare The next big issue confronting the workers is the question of wages.摆在工人面前的第二大问题是工资问题。
vt. 使混乱；使困惑 同义词:cloud, discombobulate The two steps cannot be confused.这两个步骤不能搞混了。

n. 混淆，混乱；困惑 同义词:chaos, disorder, involvement, mix, turmoil Some of this confusion reflects a widespread misunderstanding about how China's integration into the world economy affects prices in the rich world .这些困惑反映了对于融入全球经济的中国如何影响发达国家的价格产生的世界范围内的误解。
adj. 认真的；尽责的；本着良心的；小心谨慎的 同义词:serious, earnest They scrutinise unusual items and bring a proprietor 's conscientious attitude to bear.他们会详查异常项目，采取所有者的尽责态度。
adj. 意识到的；故意的；神志清醒的 同义词:aware, intended, studied, designed They are conscious acceptors of culture from other country and active spreaders of it as well.外语教师既是异域文化自觉的接受者，又是异域文化主动的传播者。
n. 结果；重要性；推论 同义词:outcome, product, result, significance, event, conclusion Its chief consequence is that they cannot do their job well.其主要后果是，它们不能做好自己的本职工作。
adj. 相当大的；重要的，值得考虑的 同义词:crucial, important, material, big, major That merchant stacked up considerable profits in a few months .那个商人在几个月内就积聚起大量利润。
vi. 组成；在于；符合 同义词:make up, be composed of Carbon dioxide consists of carbon and oxygen.二氧化碳是由碳和氧组成的。
n. [计] 控制台；[电] 操纵台 vt. 安慰；慰藉 同义词:Prefs, operation desk, comfort, quiet He consoled her with honeyed words.他用甜言蜜语安慰她。
vi. 共谋；协力 vt. [法] 密谋策划 同义词:cooperate, concert The criminals conspired to rob a bank.这些罪犯阴谋策划抢劫银行。
n. 治安官，巡警；警察 同义词:police, pig, copper " Look , constable , " I continued , taking out my wallet and withdrawing the picture of my son from it .“请看，警官，”我一边说，一边拿出钱夹，从里面取出儿子的照片。
adv. 建设性地 In Bali , Beijing was repeatedly praised for engaging constructively .在巴厘会议上，中国多次因积极参与而受到表扬。
vt. 查阅；商量；向…请教 vi. 请教；商议；当顾问 同义词:look up, speak together, take advice, seek advice I have to consult the manager about the matter.关于这件事我得向经理请示一下。
n. 消费者；用户，顾客 同义词:user, customer, client, guest Core consumer prices have been falling slightly for most of this year .今年大部分时间的核心消费者物价指数稍有下降。
n. 接触，联系 vt. 使接触 vi. 联系，接触 同义词:touch, link, meet, to link When you contact these two wires, the machine will start at once.当你使这两条导线一接触，这台机器就会立刻开始运转。
vt. 污染，弄脏 n. 受到污染的 同义词:soil, mud, spot, dirty, poison The river was contaminated with waste from the factory.这条河流被从工厂流出的废物所污染。
n. 轻视，蔑视；耻辱 同义词:despite, defiance He interpreted . the silence as contempt .他把这沉默视为轻蔑。
n. 内容，目录；满足；容量 adj. 满意的 vt. 使满足 同义词:satisfaction, directory, bulk, list, fill, satisfactory, well-pleasing, gratify, appease Two glasses of beer contented him.两杯啤酒就使他心满意足了。
adj. 满足的；心安的 v. 使…满足；使…安心（content的过去式和过去分词） 同义词:fulfilled, complacent These colours give you a happy and contented feeling .这些颜色给人一种幸福和惬意的感觉。
n. 争论，争辩；争夺；论点 同义词:thesis, combat The division of their father's property is their bone of contention .他们父亲财产分配的问题是他们争吵的原因。
n. 内容；[图情][计] 目录；要旨（content的复数） v. 使满意（content的三单形式） 同义词:properties, indices Open a box and disclose its contents .打开盒子显露出里面的东西。
adv. 连续不断地 To safeguard our country we must continuously strengthen our defenses .为了保卫国家，我们必须继续加强防御力量。
n. 大会；[法] 惯例；[计] 约定；[法] 协定；习俗 同义词:tradition, usage, institution, appointment, bond Have you been to that convention center before ?你以前去过那个会议中心吗？

adj. 符合习俗的，传统的；常见的；惯例的 同义词:traditional, usual, familiar, classical The vaccine works differently from conventional vaccines in that it does not prevent infection directly .这个疫苗作用方式不同于一般的疫苗，它并不会直接防止感染。
adv. 相反地 同义词:contrary, counter, backward, inversely Conversely , the same processes can actually amplify star formation in large galaxies .相反的，相同的过程在大型星系中却能增强恒星的形成。
vt. 传达；运输；让与 同义词:communicate, release, transport This train conveys over one thousand passengers every day.这列火车每天运送一千多位旅客。
vt. 说服；使确信，使信服 同义词:assure, reason, satisfy, argue He convinced me of the difficulty of the work.他使我确信这件工作的艰巨性。
n. 护送；护卫；护航队 vt. 护航；护送 同义词:escort This merchant ship was convoyed by a destroyer.这只商船由一艘驱逐舰护航。
adj. 凉爽的；冷静的；出色的 vt. 使…冷却；使…平静下来 vi. 变凉；平息 n. 凉爽；凉爽的空气 adv. 冷静地 同义词:philosophical, cracking, still, subside, blow over, calmly, soberly Let your tea cool a little before you drink it.先让茶凉一凉再喝。
n. 坐标；同等的人或物 adj. 并列的；同等的 vt. 调整；整合 vi. 协调 同义词:paratactic, tantamount, adjust, restructure, sort, concert You must coordinate the movements of your arms and legs when swimming.游泳时你必须使臂和腿的动作相协调。
n. 珊瑚；珊瑚虫 adj. 珊瑚的；珊瑚色的 同义词:polyp This is suggested by observation of pristine coral reefs in the middle of the Pacific .这是在观察太平洋中部的原始珊瑚礁的报告中提出的。
n. （美）玉米；（英）谷物；[皮肤] 鸡眼 vt. 腌；使成颗粒 同义词:grain, zea mays, preserve to corn beef腌牛肉
n. 角落，拐角处；地区，偏僻处；困境，窘境 vi. 囤积；相交成角 vt. 垄断；迫至一隅；使陷入绝境；把…难住 同义词:region, area, difficulty, zone, section, stock, forestall, monopolize The police finally cornered the thief.警察最后把盗贼逼得走投无路。
vi. 关联 vt. 使有相互关系；互相有关系 n. 相关物；相关联的人 adj. 关联的 同义词:relative, associated It is interesting to correlate the history of the 20th century with its literature.把20世纪的历史与文学联系起来是很有趣的。
n. 通信；一致；相当 同义词:accordance, communication, unity, agreement, identity Hardly less enjoyment and insight are to be got from Adams ' s correspondence .我们还可以从亚当斯的书信里得到同样的乐趣和洞见。
n. 走廊 同义词:hall, passage, gallery, verandah, slype Jack listens and exits out the corridor .杰克只好从命，离开了走廊。
adj. 美容的；化妆用的 n. 化妆品；装饰品 同义词:decoration, toiletry Is this the cosmetic counter ?是化妆品柜台吗？
n. 服装，装束；戏装，剧装 vt. 给…穿上服装 同义词:clothing, wear, garment, apparel The leading role in the film is costumed in medieval armor.影片中的主角穿着中古时代的甲胄。
n. 小屋；村舍；（农舍式的）小别墅 同义词:shed, cabin Why heterosexual men go cottaging or cruising baffles most people.大多数人对异性恋者像同性恋者一样在公共厕所聚集或四出猎艳感到迷惑不解。
n. 火车卧铺；有卧铺的车厢 Nevertheless that night he went to the theatre in Berlin , took a train to Munich and slept well in couchette .然而那天晚上，他去了柏林的剧院，还搭火车去了慕尼黑，而且在卧铺上安然入睡。
adj. 无数的；数不尽的 同义词:thousand, million, infinite, innumerable Countless compounds are to be found in the industrial registers .在工业产品目录中还会出现无数的化合物。
n. 国家；故乡 adj. 乡下的；粗野的 同义词:nation, state, soil, hometown, rural, robust, gross, rough, bush How about country life ?乡村生活怎么样？
n. 乡下人，农村人；同胞 同义词:peasant, provincial A countryman once went to a town .有一次，一个乡下人进城去。

n. 对；夫妇；数个 vi. 结合；成婚 vt. 结合；连接；连合 同义词:immune to, conjugality, bond, become one, combine, become one, join together The train will be ready to leave when all the carriages have been coupled.在所有车厢都连接好时列车即可开出。
n. 勇气；胆量 同义词:nerve, heart Courage is knowing what not to fear .勇气就是所知道的不惧怕。
n. 过程；进程；道路；一道菜 vt. 追赶；跑过 vi. 指引航线；快跑 同义词:path, mechanism, process, way, road, pursue, chase after, double up The deer coursed the open field.这只鹿奔跑越过开阔的原野。
n. 法院；球场；朝廷；奉承 vt. 招致（失败、危险等）；向…献殷勤；设法获得 vi. 求爱 同义词:playfield, banc, invite, secure, spell, incur, woo He has been courting her for the last three months.在过去的三个月中他一直在向她求爱。
n. 奶牛，母牛；母兽 vt. 威胁，恐吓 同义词:dairy cattle, crummie, to threaten, threaten with The teacher cowed the pupils with his hard eyes.老师用严厉的目光吓唬学生们。

vt. 使破裂；打开；变声 vi. 破裂；爆裂 n. 裂缝；声变；噼啪声 adj. 最好的；高明的 同义词:fracture, open up, fracture, come apart at the seams, split, crevice, greatest, best, perfect, prime Don't pour hot water into the glass or it will crack.不要把热水倒入玻璃杯里，否则杯子会破裂。

adj. 狭窄的；难懂的；难辨的 v. 用夹钳夹；约束（cramp的过去分词） 同义词:complicated, narrow, confined, strait, obliged Once the fish lurched suddenly , pulling Santiago forward on his face and cutting his cheek . By dawn his left hand was stiff and cramped .有一次那条鱼突然一个侧身，把桑提亚哥拉得脸朝下地跌了一跤，老人的颊部也给划破了。黎明时分，他的左手变得僵硬并抽起筋来了。
n. 吊车，起重机；鹤 vi. 伸着脖子看；迟疑，踌躇 vt. 用起重机起吊；伸长脖子 同义词:suspended ceiling, derrick, hesitate, stand at to crane up building material用起重机吊起建筑材料
vi. 爬行；匍匐行进 vt. 爬行；缓慢地行进 n. 爬行；养鱼池；匍匐而行 同义词:creep, creep, aquarium A child learns to crawl before he learns to walk.小孩在学走路之前先学爬。
n. 狂热 vi. 发狂；产生纹裂 vt. 使发狂；使产生纹裂 同义词:abandon, mania, go ape, go bananas, dement, derange The broken arm nearly crazed him with pain.那条断臂几乎使他痛得发狂。
adj. 疯狂的；狂热的，着迷的 同义词:wild, possessed, mad, enthusiastic, insane The bond markets would go crazy otherwise .否则，债券市场将上演疯狂走势。
adj. 创造性的 Well, you can take a creative writing course .你可以参加一门创作力写作课程。
adj. 轻信的；因轻信而产生的 同义词:naive, gullible She was credulous when she listened to the salesman and bought the car for too much money.她很容易轻信别人，竟然听信那个销售员的话以高价买了那辆车。
vi. 爬行；蔓延；慢慢地移动；起鸡皮疙瘩 n. 爬行；毛骨悚然的感觉；谄媚者 同义词:to spread, to extend, toadeater, kiss-ass The tortoise crept along at a very slow speed.乌龟以极慢的速度向前爬。
n. 队，组；全体人员，全体船员 vi. 一起工作 vt. 使当船员 同义词:team, group, personnel, suit Will you crew for me in tomorrow's race?你愿意在明天的赛艇比赛中充当我赛艇上的队员吗?
n. 罪行，犯罪；罪恶；犯罪活动 vt. 控告……违反纪律 同义词:sin, evil, guilt We cannot extenuate your crime .我们不能减轻你的罪。
adj. 鉴定的；[核] 临界的；批评的，爱挑剔的；危险的；决定性的；评论的 同义词:dangerous, crucial, final, decisive, marginal The imagination imitates . It is the critical spirit that create .想象是模仿，批判的精神才具有创造力。
n. 陶器；瓦器；土器 同义词:earthenware, pottery ware Description of the 100c /s Crockery , Marked GH in diamond.船货品质说明：100箱陶器，标记工员“GH”
vi. 啼叫；报晓 n. [鸟] 乌鸦；鸡鸣；撬棍 同义词:corbie, wrecking bar The rooster crows at dawn.公鸡在黎明时打鸣儿。
n. 王冠；花冠；王权；顶点 vt. 加冕；居…之顶；表彰；使圆满完成 同义词:height, sky, summit, peak, lei, coronate, cite British kings are crowned in Westminster Abbey.英国国王都在威斯敏斯特教堂加冕。
adj. 粗糙的；天然的，未加工的；粗鲁的 n. 原油；天然的物质 同义词:rough, native, robust, raw, coarse Brent crude futures have fallen to 55 dollars a barrel .北海布伦特原油期货收于每桶55美元。
n. 巡洋舰；巡航飞机，警察巡逻车 A typical cruiser or aircraft carrier may well be an easy target .标准的巡洋舰或航空母舰是一种容易被击中的目标。
n. 外壳；面包皮；坚硬外皮 vi. 结硬皮；结成外壳 vt. 盖以硬皮；在…上结硬皮 同义词:outer housing, encloser Ice crusted the lake last night.湖面上昨夜结了一层冰。
n. 碗柜；食橱 同义词:dresser, spense He foraged about in the cupboard .他在碗橱里到处寻找食物。
adv. 好奇地 同义词:inquiringly The policeman looked at the two curiously .警察好奇地瞅着这两个人。

adj. 现在的；流通的，通用的；最近的；草写的 n. （水，气，电）流；趋势；涌流 同义词:recent, now, universal, late, present, tendency, direction, tide, trend, set The excitation system should provide the appropriate field current at all times so that it is reliable and requires little maintenance .励磁系统在任何时候应能提供恰当的励磁电流，因此，励磁系统是可靠的和很少需要维修的。
n. 幕；窗帘 vt. 遮蔽；装上门帘 同义词:screen, window hangings, shadow, shield I have enough material to curtain all the windows.我有足够的料子把所有的窗户都挂上窗帘。
n. 匕首，短剑 vt. 用剑刺 同义词:knife, stiletto The outlaw pulled out dagger and bade defiance to the policemen .那名歹徒拔出匕首，悍然与警察对抗。
vi. 摇晃地悬挂着 vt. 使摇晃地悬挂 The rope dangled in the breeze.绳索在微风中悬荡。
n. 破折号；冲撞 vt. 使…破灭；猛撞；泼溅 vi. 猛冲；撞击 同义词:jerking motion, discomfit, knock against, impinge on She dashed the glass into smithereens against the wall.她把玻璃杯撞在墙上砸得粉碎。
n. 汽车等的仪表板；马车等前部的挡泥板 Does have an annoying rattle from dashboard though .但汽车仪表板确有恼人的卡嗒声…
n. 王太子的妻子；王妃 同义词:princess, rani The entrance to the cave is on a plateau in the Dauphine Alps .此洞穴的入口在多芬·阿尔卑斯山的一个高原上。
vi. 混日子；游手好闲；偷懒 vt. 混日子；游手好闲；浪费时间 同义词:spare oneself, goof off, goof off, hell around Stop dawdling and help me with these suitcases.别偷懒了，快来帮我拿这些手提箱吧。
n. 黎明；开端 vt. 破晓；出现；被领悟 同义词:morning, origin, come out, break of day The day dawned with a cloudless sky.东方发白，晴空万里无云。
n. 白天；日光；黎明；公开 同义词:morning, sunlight, publicity, open Let daylight dry your tears .让白天带走你的泪水。
vt. 处理；给予；分配；发牌 vi. 处理；讨论；对待；做生意 n. 交易；（美）政策；待遇；份量 同义词:afford, allow, extend, deliver, part, manage, debate, cope with, policy, business, trade, truck Science deals with facts.科学是论述客观事实的。

n. 经销商；商人 v. 商人 同义词:distributor, trader The imprimatur of a good dealer is well worth the 50 per cent sales commission that artists bitch to their mates about.一家优秀代理商的认可是完全值得那50%的销售佣金的，虽然艺术家常常向他们的伙伴抱怨这一点。
adj. 亲爱的；尊敬的；昂贵的 adv. 高价地；疼爱地 int. 哎呀 n. 亲爱的人 同义词:loving, expensive, rich, costly, oh, my, ohone, machree Look , dear . Do you like the beautiful moon ?看，亲爱的。你喜欢美丽的月亮吗？
n. 债务；借款；罪过 同义词:liability, loan, borrowing But some people get deep into debt .但有些人也深陷于债务之中。

n. 欺骗，欺诈；骗术 同义词:fraud, confidence game They use fewer " hesitation words ", such as " um " and "er", suggesting that they may have been coached in their deception .他们较少使用像“嗯”、“哦”之类的“踌躇不决词汇”，这表明他们的行骗已经训练有素。
n. 甲板；行李仓；露天平台 vt. 装饰；装甲板；打扮 同义词:board, storage room, paint, hang, dress oneself, array They were all decked out in their Sunday best.他们着意打扮，穿上了节日盛装。
vt. 宣布，声明；断言，宣称 vi. 声明，宣布 同义词:bill, state, to announce, hand down to declare one's position in a controversy表明某人在争论中的立场
vt. 装饰；布置；授勋给 vi. 装饰；布置 同义词:paint, hang, make, post, set sth out, trick out to decorate walls of the lobby with murals用壁画装饰大厅的墙壁
vt. 责难，谴责；诽谤 同义词:wrong, impugn He decried the lack of support for the arts in this country.他谴责在这个国家里对艺术缺乏支持。
vt. 致力；献身；题献 同义词:give oneself, devote to The ancient Greeks dedicated many shrines to Aphrodite.古希腊人以许多神殿供奉(爱与美的女神)阿佛洛狄特。
adj. 专用的；专注的；献身的 v. 以…奉献；把…用于（dedicate的过去式和过去分词） 同义词:devoted, special The ancient Greeks dedicated many shrines to Aphrodite.古希腊人以许多神殿供奉(爱与美的女神)阿佛洛狄特。
vt. 推论，推断；演绎出 同义词:understand, reason, conclude From the evidence the detective deduced that the servant had done it.根据证据侦探推断是佣人所为。
n. 鹿 Oh , what a lovely deer .哦，多么可爱的小鹿呀。
n. 防御；防卫；答辩；防卫设备 同义词:protection, reply, answer China also feels that its nuclear strategy is being undermined by missile defence systems under development .此外，中国还觉得自己的核战略正被开发中的导弹防御系统削弱。
adj. 一定的；确切的 I want an appointment for a definite time and place .我要一个有确定的时间和地点的约会。
n. 程度，等级；度；学位；阶层 同义词:extent, classification, measure, grade, plane The university bestowed a degree on him .那所大学授予他一个学位。
vi. 延期；耽搁 vt. 延期；耽搁 n. 延期；耽搁；被耽搁或推迟的时间 同义词:wait, hold over, hold over, stand over, raincheck, postponement The driver delayed the drive until the weather cleared.驾驶员延迟到天气转晴后才出车。
adv. 故意地；谨慎地；慎重地 同义词:intentionally, purposely to deliberate a question思考问题
n. 微妙；精密 同义词:subtleness, nicety Lydgate divined some delicacy of feeling here , but did not half understand it.这里包含的微妙情绪，利德盖特有些察觉，但一点也不理解。
adj. 微妙的；精美的，雅致的；柔和的；易碎的；纤弱的；清淡可口的 同义词:subtle, female, refined, fine, fragile What a delicate work of art !多精美的一件艺术品啊！
n. 高兴 vi. 高兴 vt. 使高兴 同义词:joy, cheerfulness, pleasure, be pleased, glad, pleasure, satisfy The circus show delighted everyone.马戏团表演使每个人欣喜。
adj. 可爱的，可喜的；令人愉快的 同义词:lovely, pleasant, pretty, taking, grateful War is delightful to those who have had no experience of it.对那些没有战争经验的人来说，战争是令人兴奋的。
n. 迷惑，欺骗；错觉；幻想 同义词:fraud, befuddlement The disappointment of manhood succeeds to the delusion of youth .壮年期的失望接替青年期的幻想。
vt. 要求；需要；查询 vi. 需要；请求；查问 n. [经] 需求；要求；需要 同义词:exact, lack, desire, call for, wish, have need of, necessity, need, do, desire, want She demanded that we let her in.她要求我们让她进来。
adj. 民主的；民主政治的；大众的 同义词:popular And cooperation is what the president and the new Democratic leaders have promised .而且合作正是总统和新的民主党领导人所承诺的事。
vt. 证明；展示；论证 vi. 示威 同义词:prove, give evidence of The philosopher demonstrated a philosophical principle.那位哲学家论证了一条哲学原理。
adj. 稠密的；浓厚的；愚钝的 同义词:crass, beef-witted At the center is a dense cluster of ultra- sensitive vision cells .在中央，是一团浓密的对景象超级敏感的细胞。
vt. 否定，否认；拒绝给予；拒绝…的要求 vi. 否认；拒绝 同义词:negative, disavow, object, refuse to deny an accusation否认指控，否认被指控的罪状
n. 离开；出发；违背 同义词:leaving, starting, violation, breach, quit Usually two hours before the flight departure .通常在飞机起飞前两个小时。
adj. 依靠的；从属的；取决于…的 n. 依赖他人者；受赡养者 同义词:under, servient Do you think [the energy policy recognises we will be ] dependent on fossil fuels for some time ?你是否认为（能源政策认定我们仍将）在一段时期内依赖于化石燃料？
vt. 描述；描画 同义词:bewrite, describe v. say what is like The artist depicted them strolling through a park.艺术家画他们在公园里散步。
n. [海洋] 深度；深奥 同义词:profoundity, deepness Even a single flower , in depth of winter , is a miracle and a symbol of hope .在严冬季节，鲜花即使是一枝独秀，也是一种奇迹和希望的象征。
vi. 下降；下去；下来；遗传；屈尊 vt. 下去；沿…向下 同义词:decline, go down They descended from the mountaintop.他们从山顶下来。
n. 描述，描写；类型；说明书 同义词:presentation, type, style, characterization This simple example is a pretty good description of how evolution works .这个简单的例子是进化发生的一个非常好的描述。
vt. 遗弃；放弃；逃跑 vi. 遗弃；开小差；逃掉 n. 沙漠；荒原；应得的赏罚 adj. 沙漠的；荒凉的；不毛的 同义词:yield, quit, run out on, walk out on, sands, wold, wild, hungry Jack deserted his wife.杰克抛弃了妻子。
adj. 荒芜的；被遗弃的 v. 遗弃（desert的过去式和过去分词） 同义词:waste, arid It is staff training day and the place is deserted .今天是员工培训日，这个地方空空荡荡。

n. 欲望；要求，心愿；性欲 vt. 想要；要求；希望得到… vi. 渴望 同义词:requirement, wants, do, need, wish, feel like, wanna, require, mean, exact, rare, aspire, long for, yearn for, die for I desired candy all the time I was dieting.当我节食时我很想吃糖果。
vt. 轻视，鄙视 同义词:slight, set light by I despise anyone who is cruel to animals.我鄙视那些虐待动物的人。
prep. 尽管，不管 n. 轻视；憎恨；侮辱 同义词:in spite of, for all that, hate, hatred, contempt I failed the test despite studying all night.尽管整夜学习，我还是考试不及格。
n. 目的地，终点 同义词:goal, end-point Thus , the destination plus the DSAP define the recipient of a packet .所以，目标地址和DSAP一起定义了数据包的容器。
vt. 破坏；消灭；毁坏 同义词:undermine, founder Fire destroyed several houses in the area.大火烧毁了该地区的几栋房子。
n. 细节，详情 vt. 详述；选派 vi. 画详图 同义词:specific, minutia, expand on, enlarge on The computer's characteristics are fully detailed in the brochure.计算机的性能在这小册子里有详尽说明。
adj. 详细的，精细的；复杂的，详尽的 v. 详细说明（detail的过去分词） 同义词:complicated, strict, particular, specific, involved, specified Yet the report , released last month , is short on detailed advice .但是，在上月发表的报告中缺少详细的建议。
adj. 侦探的 n. 侦探 同义词:tec, hawkshaw detective inspected the room for fingerprints .侦探检查房间寻找指纹。
vt. 开发；进步；使成长；使显影 vi. 发育；生长；进化；显露 同义词:exploit, open up, grow, flower to develop natural resources开发自然资源
vt. 设计；想出；发明；图谋；遗赠给 n. 遗赠 同义词:design, engineer, style, project, frame, legacy, bequest The professor has devised a new method of teaching foreign languages.那位教授发明了一种教外语的新方法。
vt. 吞食；毁灭；凝视 同义词:devastate, wrack and ruin The hungry man devoured his dinner.那饿汉狼吞虎咽地把饭吃光了。
vt. 诊断；断定 vi. 诊断；判断 同义词:tell, figure out, judge of, pass upon The doctor diagnosed the illness as pneumonia.医生诊断此病为肺炎。
n. 尊严；高贵 同义词:sanctity, nobility But he is a man of great dignity , superior talents and high ideals .但他是一个很有尊严的人，具有超人的才华和崇高的理想。
adj. 荒废的，要塌似的；破坏的 v. 变得荒废（dilapidate的过去分词） 同义词:destructive, obsolescent The building had been dilapidated by neglect.这座大楼因失修而圮毁。

adj. 暗淡的，昏暗的；模糊的，看不清的；悲观的，怀疑的 vt. 使暗淡，使失去光泽；使变模糊 vi. 变模糊，变暗淡 n. 笨蛋，傻子 同义词:fuzzy, dark, dirty, lowering, breathe upon, fog, mist, simple, turkey, put, idiot, stupid When the music started,someone dimmed the lights.乐曲开奏时就有人把舞台上的灯光转暗了。
vt. 使减少；使变小 vi. 减少，缩小；变小 同义词:micrify, minify, to cut down, fall off The dry spell quickly diminished our water suply.干旱期使我们的水供应锐减。
adv. 朦胧地；微暗 同义词:indistinctly, hazily When the music started,someone dimmed the lights.乐曲开奏时就有人把舞台上的灯光转暗了。
n. 小艇；小船 同义词:boat, tender They will not surrender to dinghy .他们决不会向一只小艇投降。

adj. 直接的；直系的；亲身的；恰好的 vt. 管理；指挥；导演；指向 vi. 指导；指挥 adv. 直接地；正好；按直系关系 同义词:immediate, right, manage, conduct, run, officer, control, supervise, to command, immediately, straight, just, fair The general manager directed the company through a difficult time.总经理带领公司渡过了难关。
n. 缺点；不利条件；损失 同义词:defect, deficiency, vice, losing, expense He was disadvantaged by illness.疾病使他伤了元气。
vi. 消失；失踪；不复存在 vt. 使…不存在；使…消失 同义词:blank, vanish away, plough under She disappeared down the corridor.她消失在走廊尽头。
n. 消失；不见 同义词:extinction, evaporation This trend is symbolised by the disappearance of blacks .这一趋势的代表现象就是黑人的消失。
adj. 令人失望的；令人扫兴的 v. 令人失望（disappoint的ing形式）；辜负…的期望 同义词:disillusionary, cauld Judged by his own standards , Mr Sarkozy 's first year disappointing .以他自己的标准来看，萨科齐的第一年是令人失望的。
n. 灾难，灾祸；不幸 同义词:tragedy, evil, calamity, grief So far rust has not caused a disaster .到目前为止，锈病并没有造成灾害。

vt. 抛弃；放弃；丢弃 vi. 放弃 n. 抛弃；被丢弃的东西或人 同义词:yield, desert, quit, fall out of, render up, to renounce, to abandon, to give up, rejection, abandonment He discarded an old hat and an old pair of shoes.他扔掉了一顶旧帽子和一双旧鞋。

n. 发现，发觉；被发现的事物 同义词:detection, occurrence, find Still , the discovery is seen as good news for people who have severe dry skin or other conditions that cause itching .对于那些患有由严重皮肤干燥或其它原因引起的瘙痒病人，这一发现仍然是一个好消息。

adv. 谨慎地；小心地 同义词:carefully, deliberately Boy is also discreetly fixed in the context of Japan 's recent history , in a way which again may be read as a response to Ozu .《少年》也被谨慎地限定在日本近代历史的情境之中，这一做法又一次可被解读为是对小津的回应。
vi. 登陆，下车；上岸 vt. 使……登陆；使……上岸 同义词:land, go ashore to disembark passengers from the ferry让乘客下渡船
n. 碟，盘；一道菜 vt. 把…装盘；使成碟状 vi. 成碟状；闲谈 同义词:plate, course, visit, chin music She dished the food onto plates.她把食物盛在盘上。
vt. 使醒悟；使不再抱幻想 n. 幻灭；醒悟 同义词:undeceive, disenchantment, evanescence I hate to disillusion you,but your chances of winning are practically zero.我不忍心使你失望，但你取胜的机会实际上等于零。
vt. 不喜欢，厌恶 n. 嫌恶，反感，不喜爱 同义词:hate, have no relish for, hate, detestation I dislike jogging early in the morning.我不喜欢早晨慢跑。
vt. 使脱臼；使混乱 同义词:cloud, confuse A long-protracted strike dislocated the economy.长期罢工打乱了经济秩序。
vt. 拆除；取消；解散；除掉…的覆盖物 vi. 可拆卸 同义词:recall, demolish to dismantle a fortress拆除防御工事
vt. 解散；解雇；开除；让...离开 vi. 解散 同义词:remove, fire out, disband, break up The teacher dismissed the class early.老师早下课。
adj. 混乱的；害了病的；发狂的；失调的 同义词:chaotic, confused, troubled, turbulent She is wearing glasses , a baggy old sweater , a pencil in disordered hair .她戴着一副眼镜，穿着一件宽大的旧毛衣，蓬乱的头发里插着一支铅笔。
vt. 驱散，驱逐；消除（烦恼等） 同义词:eliminate, avoid The sun dispelled the dense fog.太阳驱散了浓雾。
vt. 忽视；不理；漠视；不顾 n. 忽视；不尊重 同义词:ignore, neglect, inobservancy, negligence He doesn't disregard the footnotes.他并没有不注意脚注。
adj. 令人不快的；不合口味的；表示厌恶的 同义词:painful, unfavorable Have you ever found a work policy or rule to be distasteful ? How did you handle it?你有没有发现一个工作的政策或规则是令你讨厌的？那你是怎么处理呢？
vt. 区分；辨别；使杰出，使表现突出 vi. 区别，区分；辨别 同义词:tell apart, differentiate, differentiate, tell from She was distinguished from the other girls by her height.她身材高挑有别于其他女孩。
adj. 著名的；卓著的；高贵的 v. 区别（distinguish的过去式） 同义词:famous, noted, royal, renowned, celebrated He was very popular, a distinguished fashion figure as well as financier .他是非常有声望的，一位杰出的时髦人物和金融家。
adj. 令人不安的；烦扰的 v. 干扰；打断（disturb的ing形式） 同义词:disconcerting, worrisome, interrupting A century after its conception , quantum mechanics continues to disturbing theory.量子力学已经诞生一个世纪了，却仍然令人感到困惑。
adj. 废弃不用的 v. 废弃（disuse的过去分词） 同义词:antiquated some disused traditional customs一些已废弃的传统风俗习惯
vi. 潜水；跳水；俯冲；急剧下降 n. 潜水；跳水；俯冲；扑 同义词:pitch down, phreatic water, underground water She dove straight into the pool.她径直跳入池中。

n. 转移；消遣；分散注意力 同义词:entertainment, transfer, occupation, recreation, metastasis Such " over- reach ", in Dr Kochi 's view , amounts to a costly , risky diversion of resources away from the realistic aim of just controlling malaria .在高池博士看来，这种“过度扩展”无异于是一种昂贵而风险的资源配置，并远离了仅仅控制疟疾这一实际目标。
n. 跳水，潜水 adj. 跳水的，潜水的 v. 跳水（dive的现在分词）；潜水 同义词:phreatic water, underground water, phreatic She dove straight into the pool.她径直跳入池中。
n. 行为规范；（英）欢庆会；应该做的事（do的复数形式） to do a great deal干一番大事业
adj. 自己动手的 n. 自己动手；喜欢自己装配或修理东西 The worst thing about the do-it - yourself game is that sometimes .自己动手的例子中最糟糕的是，有时。
n. 圆屋顶 vi. 成圆顶状 vt. 加圆屋顶于…上 同义词:cupola His forehead domed out in a curve.他的前额呈半球形凸起。
